subject: Security Alert: Unusual Activity Detected on Your Account

body.text:
SECURITY ALERT

We detected unusual activity on your Chase checking account ending in 4567.

Transaction Details:
Amount: $1,247.89
Merchant: Electronics Store
Location: Los Angeles, CA
Date: January 15, 2025 at 2:15 PM

If this was you, no action is needed.

If you don't recognize this transaction:
